Joe Corcoran

Hello

I’m a software developer, mostly working on web applications. I have spent most of my life so far in Manchester and London, UK, but I currently live in Berlin, Germany where I work at tape.tv.

I write and maintain some open source software projects and I sometimes write about software development and people. I’m also a coach at Ruby Monstas, which is a weekly Rails Girls Berlin study group.

I’m interested in programming languages, music, football and design. When I’m not thinking about that stuff you will often find me playing football, riding a bike or cooking vegetarian food.

You can write to me or shout at me on Twitter.
